actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain phosphate interests of the United States to the owner or owners of record of certain lands in the State of Florida.

summary.text: Directs and authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified phosphate interests of the United States to the present owner or owners of record of specified lands in Lee County in the State of Florida. Provides for the charging of administrative costs related to such conveyance.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain phosphate interests of the United States to the owner or owners of record of certain lands in the State of Florida.
